subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Mali struck back from being 4-0 down in the 79th minute of the opening match of the African Cup of Nations to earn a sensational 4-4 draw with the host, Angola.
snippet: Mali struck back from being 4-0 down in the 79th minute of the opening match of the African Cup of Nations to earn a sensational 4-4 draw with the host, Angola.
